CustomField.inlineHelpText: Your caseworker will provide you with a copy of the Advance Directive for Selecting a Health Care Agent, to help you in the process of appointing a Health Care Agent should you choose to do so
CustomField.label: Your caseworker will provide you with

value.fullName: Discussed the importance of designating a Health Care Agent
value.label: Discussed the importance of designating a Health Care Agent

value.fullName: Received copy of the Advance Directive for Selecting a Health Care-Agent
value.label: Received copy of the Advance Directive for Selecting a Health Care-Agent
